Room.Name: Brownhaven Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on one of the nicest throughfares in the entire village.
Room.LongDescription: Fruit trees and shady elms line the way, and several old homes are set back away from the roadway. The homes look like old money. A little further to the north is where the professional people of Brownhaven have their business establishments. Perhaps this is the section of town where they live.
